wikitext.*:
{{disambig-two|the [[Sindarin]] word|Man of the [[House of Bëor]]|[[Baran]]}}
'''''baran''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word glossed as "brown, swart, dark brown",<ref name=Ety>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 351 (listed as [[Noldorin|Exilic Noldorin]])</ref> "golden brown",<ref>{{HM|N}}, p. 765 (listed as Sindarin)</ref> and "brown, yellow-brown".<ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. 343 (listed as Sindarin; quoting from the manuscript "[[Index questions]]")</ref>

==Etymology==

*[[Sundocarme|Root]] [[BARÁN]]<ref name=Ety/>

==Examples==

*[[Baranduin|'''Baran'''duin]]
*[[Brown Lands|'''Beren'''nyr]]

==See also==

*[[Noldorin]] ''[[rhosc]]'' ("brown")<ref>{{VT|45a}}, p. 7</ref>
